Ideographic: Rice 米 that must be ground 厲; 厲 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 米 [ mǐ ] rice, millet, grain
    • 厲 [ lì ] whetstone; to grind, to sharpen, to whet

糲字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　糲； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页913第47
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?力制切，音勵。【廣韻】麤也。【篇海】米不精也。【史記·聶政傳】用爲夫人麤糲之費。【太史公自序】糲粱之食。【註】張晏曰：一斛粟舂七㪷米爲糲。瓚曰：五斗粟三斗米爲糲。正義曰：脫粟也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?落蓋切，音賴。義同。　又【廣韻】力達切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】郞達切，?音辣。義同。【列子·力命篇】食則粢糲。【註】糲，令達反。　又【韻會小補】叶力糵切。【白居易詩】檢點盤中餐，非精亦非糲。檢點身上衣，無餘亦無闕。　【說文】本作䊪。或作?。

[Uncollected First] [Mi Zi Department] 　粝; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 913 Page 47
[Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Forced cutting, sound encouragement. [Guang Yun] It's rough. [Article Sea] Rice is not refined either. 【Historical Records·Nie Zhengzhuan】Used as a rough expense for the wife. [Preface from Taishi Gong] The food of the rice beams. [Note] Zhang Yan said: One Dendrobium millet and seven millimeters of rice are 粝. Zan said: Five buckets of millet and three buckets of rice are glutinous. Justice said: Tuosu also.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Luo Gaiqie, Yin Lai. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] Li Daqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Yin Daqie, the sound is spicy. The same meaning. 【Liezi·Liming Articles】Eat can lead to glutinous rice. [Note] 粝, make Da counter.　[Yunhui Xiaobu] Ye Liqi cut. [Bai Juyi's Poems] Check the plate of Chinese food, which is neither refined nor glutinous. Check the tops, there is nothing left and no faults.　【Said the text】This is for you. Or for?.
